WorkItem.Description:
According to Elitist Jerks as well as my personal observations (my own ans seen on other Ass Rogues) it appears as though the Rawr.Rogue is valuing Expertise above Haste and Mastery.
Â 
I'm not entirely sure if Rawr is changing the Stat values dependent on the Specialization of the Rogue or if some other mechanic is causing the bloated Expertise values.

Comments.Message:
Rawr does not use stat weights. Period.

If Expertise seems high, please follow the posting guidelines and include your character file and quote points where something is wrong.
What Jothay say plus just don't use the Rogue model atm until I'm done with the splitting of the solvers.
